# -*- coding: utf-8 -*- <%inherit file="content_layout.html"/> <%page args="toc, extension, paged"/> <%namespace name="formatting" file="formatting.html"/> <%namespace name="nav" file="nav.html"/> <%namespace name="pydoc" file="pydoc.html"/> <%def name="title()">SQLAlchemy 0.3 Documentation - Modules and Classes <%! filename = 'docstrings' import cPickle as pickle import os %> <% filename = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(self.filename), 'compiled_docstrings.pickle') data = pickle.load(file(filename)) %> % for obj in data: ${pydoc.obj_doc(obj=obj, toc=toc, extension=extension, paged=paged)} % endfor
